content: From my perspective it is likely impossible for countries to fully trust one another, however when there is increased communication and openness there is a decrease in conflicts. Therefore I believe that when we are considering policies around AI communication and openness we should lean more on the side of having complete transparency rather than having less transparency.
There are other ways to solve conflicts.
